name: Mashed Potatoes
directions: Peel and cut potatoes into chunks. Boil until tender.
Drain and mash potatoes. Stir in milk and butter and season with salt and pepper.

name: Green Beans
directions: Blanch green beans in boiling water.
Heat oil in a skillet and sauté garlic until fragrant. Add green beans and season with salt and pepper.

name: Garlic Bread
directions: Combine butter, garlic, and parsley and spread on cut sides of bread.

name: Coleslaw
directions: Combine cabbage and carrot in a bowl.
In a separate bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper.

name: Macaroni and Cheese
directions: Cook macaroni according to the package directions. Drain.
In a saucepan, melt butter or margarine over medium heat. Stir in enough flour to absorb all of the butter.
Stir in milk, salt, and pepper. Cook, stirring constantly, until mixture comes to a boil.
Stir in cheeses, and cook until melted; stir in cooked macaroni.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 30 minutes. Serve.
